accountVerification.title: Account verification
accountVerification.body: in order to verify your account at SBC PDU management, you need to verify your e-mail address by clicking on the link bellow. Please note that this link will expire in 7 days.

passwordChanged.title: Password changed
passwordChanged.body: The password for your has been changed. We are notifying you so you can ensure this change is from a trusted user.

passwordRecovery.title: Password recovery
passwordRecovery.body: a password reset was requested for your account. To reset your password, click the link below. Please note that this link will expire in 24 hours. If you did not issue a password reset request, you may ignore this email.

passwordSet.title: Setting up a password for your new account
passwordSet.body: an account has been created for you by an administrator. To set your password, click the link below. Please note that this link will expire in 24 hours.

totpAdded.title: Two-factor authentication token added
totpAdded.body:
a two-factor authentication token %name% has been added to your account.
If you did not add this token, please contact your administrator immediately.

totpDeleted.title: Two-factor authentication token deleted
totpDeleted.body:
a two-factor authentication token %name% has been deleted from your account.
If you did not delete this token, please contact your administrator immediately.
